document.full_text: a 20-year-old california man was arrested on wednesday, accused of planting spyware on dozens of computers to secretly photograph women in a state of undress, police said.
document.title: california man accused of planting spyware to photograph women
lines_and_colors: a 20-year-old california man was arrested on wednesday, accused of planting spyware on dozens of computers to secretly photograph women in a state of undress, police said.
